name: Remedy (itch) (nin · elli)
description:
When humanity falls to cybernetic madness, only a virus may save them from their own insanity.

★ GOOD OLD ARCADE FUN ★

Need a short, action-packed arcade shooter to entertain you while you're waiting in that endless loading screen? Boot up Remedy. Controls are simple and intuitive, gameplay is fun and straight-forward, it's all there for you to enjoy!

★ A DYSTOPIAN FUTURE ★

Remedy takes place in a dystopian future, where humanity became obsessed with implants and cybernetics. Losing their humanity to become mindless machines as steel takes over their conscience, the future looks grim for humans.

Leo and Sarah are viruses. Tired of seeing the world fall into the hands of cyber madness, they decide to act and invade human bodies to deactivate their implants from the inside, in a desperate attempt to save what's left of humanity.


★ 2 PLAYER GAMEPLAY ★

You can either choose to fight alone, or with a second player! Connect a second controller and take the fight to the enemy in an exciting two-player coop mode. Beware though, your lives are shared! Work together to survive as long as you can and aim for the highest score!


★ KEY FEATURES ★

- Simple and intuitive player controls.
- Singleplayer AND 2-player coop available.
- Enemies become stronger and come in bigger numbers as your score increases.
- Get powerups to increase your firepower.
- Boss fights!
- Fully drawn in-game cutscenes
- Fully voiced character dialogues
- An immersive ambiance!


★ CONTROLS ★

Please note: a controller is required to play the game.

Left stick -> Movement
Left Trigger (hold) -> Aim
Right Trigger -> Fire (can be held to fire continuously)
